text: No. 2 is a 2006 New Zealand comedy drama movie directed by Toa Fraser and was based on the 2000 play of the same name. It stars Ruby Dee, Taungaroa Emile, Tuva Novotny, Rene Naufahu, Nathaniel Lees, Antony Starr, Pio Terei, Xavier Horan and was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * Category:2006 comedy movies Category:2006 drama movies Category:New Zealand comedy movies Category:New Zealand drama movies Category:Movies based on plays
title: No. 2 (movie)
